name: proxy-ai-fusion
description: High-performance AI proxy service with load balancing and real-time monitoring

scripts.dev:simple: bun run dev:build && bun run --hot server/index.ts
scripts.dev:build: bunx tailwindcss -i src/styles/globals.css -o public/assets/styles.css --minify && bun build src/main.tsx --outdir public/assets --target browser --sourcemap=external
scripts.build: bun run build:frontend && bun run build:server
scripts.build:frontend: bunx tailwindcss -i src/styles/globals.css -o public/assets/styles.css --minify && bun build src/main.tsx --outdir public/assets --target browser --minify
